WhatYouLearn:
As a working student within CORE, your passion lies in the
improving business processes and management
changing risks within organizations. The
clients range from listed companies
organizations to public institutions.

You are engaged in risk management assignments from
both a monitoring and transformation perspective.
Monitoring allows you to see where the risks are most important
business processes and whether these risks are sufficient
are covered and, where necessary, you advise on the
needed improvements.

You advise and assist companies in major transformations
executing strategic projects for their
achieve objectives. You provide the customer
analyzes and concrete recommendations that you then
can implement together.

You support risk management assignments with a
focus on business processes and supporting IT. You're coming
in touch with the latest developments where our
customers are increasingly engaged, such as on it
field of Cloud, AI, Robotics Process Automation,
Blockchain.
WhyUs:
- A fixed salary.
- Always keep growing. With our development program.
- Reimbursement for your home workplace in an ergonomic
responsible way and an internet fee.
- Flexible working hours, you share your own agenda.
- 26 vacation days per year with full-time employment and the
possibility to purchase additional days.
- Exchange 3 national holidays for 3 non-national holidays.

If you want.
- A laptop. Also for private use.
- A pension scheme where your own contribution is only 2%.

For later.
- A time-by-time arrangement. Use the time you have on one
moment more in moments that matter to you.
- Ability to participate in the collective
health insurance scheme.
- Tax benefits. Think corporate fitness, it
purchasing a bicycle against gross salary or the possibility
to lease a bicycle.
- The possibility to use 55 hours of babysitting service
per calendar year, if your child is 12 or younger.
- A monthly budget that allows you to make choices in
flexible working conditions such as extra holidays or the
financing a bicycle plan.
- Six weeks of fully paid maternity leave for traditional
households and rainbow families.
